Posts.Content: Mar 29, 2008 08:55PM luci25 wrote: i am the mother of a beautiful 38 year old that will be starting chemo for a stage 1 breast cancer that is estrogen negative on april 11th. i really need some tips on how i can be supportive for her during this time. i feel that my own heart is being ripped from my chest but at the same time im reassuring her that we will get through this together
Posts.Title: Starting chemo in April haykat57 angie27
